participant_1.background:
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
I have always been close to my parents.
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I've been working at my current job for a year.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

participant_2.background:
I'm afraid of not being able to make my juicing bar a success.
i dyed my hair pink.
i work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay, thanks! I'm a little nervous about my new business venture, but I'm excited too.
What kind of business are you starting?
It's a juicing bar. I'm really passionate about healthy eating and I think it's a great way to make a difference in people's lives.
That's awesome! I'm sure it will be a success.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into vinyl records right now.
Me too! I have a small collection of my own.
That's awesome! What kind of records do you have?
I have a lot of classic rock, jazz, and blues.
Nice! I have a lot of indie rock, folk, and soul.
